Hi,

I am looking at the recover job feature.  Correct me if I am wrong, bu=
t is
it only able to reload the urls that it visited and the ones that are =
on the
queue, and doesn't load up the information originally associated wit=
h the
CrawlURI object or CandidateURI object?

I need to store information =
in a CandidateURI, so when it becomes a CrawlURI
I can do something with it=
 depending on an associatated value using the
putObject/getObject methods, =
that has been passed through the Frontier.  As
long as the Frontier thinks =
it isn't a URL that we have already visited.

Regards,
Alex
